subject: Re: How to run a JSP Testfile in browser?
msgSnippet: Hi All, I happened to ran into the same problem. Could you please help me resolve the problem? I really appreciate your help. Thanks, Nalini. ...
messageBody:
Hi All,

I happened to ran into the same problem. Could you please help
me resolve the problem? I really appreciate your help.

Thanks,
Nalini.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Kabarnacius Anandaraj
<kabarnacius_a@y...> wrote:
> Hi friends,
> Successfully I can run a servlet test files in
> browser. I am using Tomcat4.1 server I added these
> tags in to web.xml file.
>
> <!-- JSP Redirector URL configuration -->
> <servlet>
> <servlet-name>JspRedirector</servlet-name>
> <jsp-file>/jspRedirector.jsp</jsp-file>
> </servlet>
>
> <!-- JSP Redirector URL mapping -->
>
> <servlet-mapping>
> <servlet-name>JspRedirector</servlet-name>
> <url-pattern>/CactusJspRedirector</url-pattern>
> </servlet-mapping>
> my class files are in webapps-àtest-à WEB-INFà classes
> deirectory
>
> If I try to run the jsp test files from browser I am
> getting this exceptions
>
> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
> - <testsuites>
> - <testsuite name="TestTagLib" tests="2" failures="0"
> errors="2" time="0.231">
> - <testcase name="testDoStartTag" time="0.111">
> <error message="Failed to get the test results at
> [http://localhost:8080/test/JspRedirector%5d"
>
type="org.apache.cactus.util.ChainedRuntimeException">org.apache.cact
us.util.ChainedRuntimeException:
> Failed to get the test results at
> [http://localhost:8080/test/JspRedirector%5d at
>
org.apache.cactus.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.dispatch49_
doTest(DefaultHttpClient.java;org/apache/cactus/util/log/LogAspect.aj
[1k]:131)
> at
>
org.apache.cactus.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.around49_do
Test(DefaultHttpClient.java;org/apache/cactus/util/log/LogAspect.aj
[1k]:1240)
> at
> org.apache.cactus.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.doTest
(DefaultHttpClient.java;org/apache/cactus/util/log/LogAspect.aj
[1k]:115)
> at
>
org.apache.cactus.internal.client.WebClientTestCaseDelegate.runWebTes
t(WebClientTestCaseDelegate
>
>
> This error is related to some web.xml setting I do not
> know how to fix this
>
> Please help me to fix this and run success fully
>
> Thanks and Regards
> kabarnacius
>
>
>
